27.eng-name: Pilgrims Prevented from Completing the Pilgrimage

hadiths.text: Narrated Nafi`:That `Abdullah and Salim said to `Abdullah bin `Umar, "(You should not go for Hajj this year)." `Abdullah bin `Umar replied, "We set out with the Prophet (to Mecca for performing `Umra) and the infidels of Quraish prevented us from reaching the Ka`ba. Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) slaughtered his Budn (camels for sacrifice) and got his head shaved

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّحْرِ قَبْلَ الْحَلْقِ فِي الْحَصْرِ
chapter.eng-name: The slaughtering before shaving the head (in case) one is prevented
